content.question: Which of the following explains the variable that would be the best for students to measure to determine the direct impact of soil erosion caused by the construction project on the river?

choices.label: Water temperature, because a decrease in shading in the area would indicate an increase in soil erosion.
Nutrient levels, because a decrease in nitrogen and phosphorus would indicate an increase in soil erosion.
The pH level, because an increase in pH would indicate an increase in soil erosion.
Turbidity, because a decrease in water clarity would indicate an increase in soil erosion.

content.answer: Turbidity, because a decrease in water clarity would indicate an increase in soil erosion.
